description: It does not seem to load. Just download from source and run with "python3 pronterface.py" command

Great software... I need to use it... but it won't run after I just rebuilt my system and moved from Ubuntu 20.04 to Kubuntu 22.04. So far I have found no solution... hopefully there is one soon otherwise this is just taking up space in the repository.
excellent programme jusqu'à un plantage du à une mise à jour ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS
